title: Emery backs Rashford and Asensio to shine in Villa´s Champions League quest
description: Unai Emery believes Marco Asensio and Marcus Rashford can prove decisive as Aston Villa bid for a deep run in the Champions League. Villa boosted their attack with the loan signings of Asensio and Rashford, from Paris Saint-Germain and Manchester United respectively, late in the winter window.
